Container.Name: beets
Container.Description: Beets is the media library management system for obsessive-compulsive music geeks. It catalogs your collection, automatically improving its metadata using the MusicBrainz database. Then it provides a bouquet of tools for manipulating and accessing your music.[br][br] [b][span style='color: #E80000;']Volumes:[/span][/b][br] [b]/config[/b] : Where the config file will be created[br] [b]/music[/b] : Location of music library[br] [b]/downloads[/b] : Location of music to be tagged[br]
Container.Overview: The purpose of beets is to get your music collection right once and for all. It catalogs your collection, automatically improving its metadata as it goes using the MusicBrainz database. Then it provides a bouquet of tools for manipulating and accessing your music.
